name: Casa Magna - Jalapa Claro - Gran Toro
additionalNotes: Casa Magna Jalapa Claro employs a smooth, caramel-colored claro wrapper grown in Nicaragua’s fertile Jalapa Valley to give it a full flavored, medium-bodied profile. Maintaining the same blend as the highly-rated Colorado, this premium is filled with carefully fermented premium Nicaraguan long-fillers covered by a Nicaraguan binder. The result is a well-balanced yet complex cigar with notes of pepper, cocoa, nuts and cedar.
